inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CD30 expression detected on 75% or more of malignant cells from either bone marrow or lymphoma mass by flow cytometry or immunohistochemistry.

inclusion.criterion: Greater than or equal to 18 years of age and less than or equal to age 73
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and sign the Informed Consent Document
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Room air oxygen saturation of 92% or greater
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative for hepatitis B surface antigen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Seronegative for hepatitis C antibody unless antigen negative
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Hodgkin lymphoma are no longer eligible for participation (as of amendment G, Protocol version: 08/12/2019)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients that require urgent therapy due to tumor mass effects or spinal cord compression.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma, which is a type of non-Hodgkin lymphoma. They have a large pericardial effusion and a cardiac MRI showed a mass on the lateral wall of the right atrium adjacent to the AV junction.
